dmca.title: FW: [AB-C114750T] Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent ThePlanet Customer
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: SkateboardDirectory.com Support [mailto:support@skateboarddirectory.com] Posted At: Tuesday, July 11, 2006 4:22 PM Posted To: Copyright Conversation: FW: [AB-C114750T] Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent ThePlanet Customer Subject: Re: FW: [AB-C114750T] Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent ThePlanet Customer Dear ThePlanet: What additional information do you need for us to "substantially comply with the required notification elements of the DMCA?" Please respond as soon as possible as this impacts possible litigation. Thank you, Josh Rabinowitz http://skateboarddirectory.com 212 533-2835 >To Whom It May Concern: > >Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does >not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the >Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). > >Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your >claim. > >Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal. > >Legal Response Team >THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. >-----Original Message----- >From: abuse@theplanet.com [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] Posted At: >Monday, July 10, 2006 11:22 AM Posted To: Copyright >Conversation: [AB-C114750T] Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent >ThePlanet Customer >Subject: [AB-C114750T] Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent >ThePlanet Customer > > >Reference: [AB-C114750T] > >For your review. > >Thank you, > >Policy Enforcement >The Planet Internet Services, Inc. >http://www.theplanet.com/legal/ > >==== Original Message ==== >1. Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent ThePlanet Customer Added by >system at Monday, Jul 10 2006 01:32 pm >X-MailFrom: support@skateboarddirectory.com >X-RcptTo: abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com >Received: from [172.16.214.180] by [10.5.0.64] (abacus) for >; Mon Jul 10 13:32:44 2006 >Return-path: >Delivery-date: Mon, 10 Jul 2006 13:32:44 -0500 >Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com ([70.87.6.111]) by >mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from >support@skateboarddirectory.com) with esmtp (Exim) id >1G00Ym-000961-3c for abuse@abacus.inside.theplanet.com; Mon, 10 Jul >2006 13:32:44 -0500 >Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by >smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); > Mon, 10 Jul 2006 13:32:43 -0500 >Received: from mx01.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.180] >helo=mx01.filter.theplanet.com) > by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from >support@skateboarddirectory.com) > with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) > (Exim) > id 1G00Yl-00078f-Fu; Mon, 10 Jul 2006 13:32:43 -0500 >Received: from mail-out4.nyct.net ([216.139.141.4] helo=bsd4.nyct.net) > by mx01.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from >support@skateboarddirectory.com) > with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) > (Exim) > id 1G00Yl-00095f-4v; Mon, 10 Jul 2006 13:32:43 -0500 >Received: from [66.234.32.30] (66-234-32-30.nyc.cable.nyct.net >[66.234.32.30]) > by bsd4.nyct.net (8.13.4/8.13.4) with ESMTP id k6AIWd8B075359; > Mon, 10 Jul 2006 14:32:40 -0400 (EDT) > (envelope-from support@skateboarddirectory.com) >Mime-Version: 1.0 >Message-Id: >Date: Mon, 10 Jul 2006 14:32:31 -0400 >To: abuse@theplanet.com, legal@theplanet.com >From: "SkateboardDirectory.com Support" > >Subject: Trademark & Copyright Abuse By Apparent ThePlanet Customer >Content-Type: text/html; charset="us-ascii" >Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 216.139.141.4 is neither >permitted nor denied by domain of skateboarddirectory.com) >client-ip=216.139.141.4; envelope-from=support@skateboarddirectory.com; >helo=bsd4.nyct.net; >X-OriginalArrivalTime: 10 Jul 2006 18:32:43.0636 (UTC) >FILETIME=[3BA02340:01C6A44F] >Received-SPF: none (mx01.filter.theplanet.com: 70.87.6.111 is neither >permitted nor denied by domain of skateboarddirectory.com) >client-ip=70.87.6.111; envelope-from=support@skateboarddirectory.com; >helo=smtp02.theplanet.com; > >MIME element (text/html) > Trademark & Copyright Abuse >By Apparent ThePlanet Customer >
From: Josh Rabinowitz
>
SkateboardDirectory.com Publisher
POBox 1532
>
New York, NY 10276-1532
>
Voice: 212 533-2835
>

>
Hello, The Planet Legal and Abuse Teams:

>
I'm writing at the suggestion of Mickey in your support >department.

I have discovered that one of >your customers is apparently abusing our common law service marks >"SkateboardDirectory.com", Skateboard Directory, >SkateboardDirectory, or "The Skateboard Directory".
>

The evidence can be found here:
face="Lucida Grande" >color="#000000" >>http://elementskateboardlive.com/skateboarddirectory.html
> >

>
This site is not licensed to represent skateboarddirectory.com, >therefore this use is a misrepresentation of the website and is an >infringment of our Trademark which is liable for prosecution and >damages under United States Civil Law.

In >addition, the page >http://elementskateboardlive.com/ contains identical content to the >page above, with the exception of "color="#000000">Skateboarddirectory" >being replaced with "Element Skateboard", so I would suggest >the entire site is actually not a bona-fide website as the same >articles appear on many pages of the website.

>
Please close the account for violation of your terms of service >and for trademark violation, and get back to us within 10 days with the >resolution of this matter.

Thank you and >Sincerely,
 Josh Rabinowitz
 Publisher, >SkateboardDirectory.com
>
 212 533-2835
>
--
>
 >
>---------------------------------------------------------------------< >>b >>r >> >Josh Rabinowitz  (212) 533-2835    Publisher, >SkateboardDirectory.com
>support@skateboarddirectory.com    >http://www.SkateboardDirectory.com/
